Title: The Proposal
Overview: When she learns she's in danger of losing her visa status and being deported, overbearing book editor Margaret Tate forces her put-upon assistant, Andrew Paxton, to marry her.
Keywords: fictitious marriage, deportation, immigration law, romantic comedy, alaska, naked scene, co-worker, humiliation, book editor, fake boyfriend, duringcreditsstinger, woman director, pretend relationship
Cast: Sandra Bullock, Ryan Reynolds, Mary Steenburgen
